attributes.action: abolish the party political system in favour of independent representatives of the people/constituencies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Independently elected MPs would follow their conscience and will of their electorate or face defeat at the next poll. All MPs should then elect a PM and Cabinet. Until a constitution is written the Lords should be abolished. Any elected representative must receive min 51% of votes. Voting to be compulsory with option to abstain.
